mapper.insert: insert into ranking_overall (date, ranking, character_name, world_name, class_name, sub_class_name, character_level, character_exp, character_popularity, character_guildname) values (#{date},#{ranking},#{character_name},#{world_name},#{class_name},#{sub_class_name},#{character_level},#{character_exp},#{character_popularity},#{character_guildname})
